mapper.update: update commodityimage set commodityId = #{commodityid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, commodityImgName = #{commodityimgname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, commodityImgDate = #{commodityimgdate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, version = #{version,jdbcType=BIGINT}, commodityImg = #{commodityimg,jdbcType=LONGVARBINARY} where commodityImgId = #{commodityimgid,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select commodityImgId, commodityId, commodityImgName, commodityImgDate, version, commodityImg from commodityimage where commodityImgId = #{commodityimgid,jdbcType=BIGINT}
select commodityImgId, commodityId, commodityImgName, commodityImgDate, version, commodityImg from commodityimage
select commodityImgId, commodityId, commodityImgName, commodityImgDate, version, commodityImg from commodityimage where commodityId=#{commodityid, jdbcType=BIGINT}
